languages.text: "Ты прав{mf||а}, {name}". {n}Голос дознавателя звенит от стыда.{/n} "Я виноват в том, что не прозрел слабину вовремя".
"You are right, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with shame.{/n} "It is my fault. I did not see the weakness in time."
languages.original_text: "Ты прав{mf||а}, {name}". {n}Голос дознавателя звенит от стыда.{/n} "Я виноват в том, что не прозрел слабину вовремя".

traits.locale_text: "You are right, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with shame.{/n} "It is my fault. I did not see the weakness in time."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with shame.{/n} "It is my fault. I did not see the weakness in time."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with shame.{/n} "It is my fault. I did not see the weakness in time."

traits.locale_text: "You are right, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with shame.{/n} "It is my fault. I did not see the weakness in time."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「そのとおりですよ、{name}さん」{n}ハインリックスの声には恥じ入る響きがある。{/n}「我の過失です。早期に弱さを見抜けなかった」
languages.original_text: "You are right, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with shame.{/n} "It is my fault. I did not see the weakness in time."

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおりですよ、{name}さん」{n}ハインリックスの声には恥じ入る響きがある。{/n}「我の過失です。早期に弱さを見抜けなかった」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你说得对，{name}。”{n}海因里希羞愧不已地开口道。{/n}“是我的疏忽，我没能及时发现他的堕落。”
languages.original_text: "You are right, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with shame.{/n} "It is my fault. I did not see the weakness in time."

traits.locale_text: “你说得对，{name}。”{n}海因里希羞愧不已地开口道。{/n}“是我的疏忽，我没能及时发现他的堕落。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez raison, {name}. {n}La voix d'Heinrix résonne de la honte qui l'habite.{/n} C'est ma faute. Je n'ai pas su voir la faiblesse à temps. »
languages.original_text: "You are right, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with shame.{/n} "It is my fault. I did not see the weakness in time."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, {name}. {n}La voix d'Heinrix résonne de la honte qui l'habite.{/n} C'est ma faute. Je n'ai pas su voir la faiblesse à temps. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Tiene razón, {name}». {n}La voz de Heinrix resuena con vergüenza.{/n} «Es culpa mía; no fui capaz de ver la debilidad a tiempo».
languages.original_text: "You are right, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with shame.{/n} "It is my fault. I did not see the weakness in time."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón, {name}». {n}La voz de Heinrix resuena con vergüenza.{/n} «Es culpa mía; no fui capaz de ver la debilidad a tiempo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht, {name}." {n}Heinrixs Stimme klingt beschämt.{/n} "Es ist meine Schuld. Ich habe die Schwäche nicht rechtzeitig erkannt."
languages.original_text: "You are right, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with shame.{/n} "It is my fault. I did not see the weakness in time."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht, {name}." {n}Heinrixs Stimme klingt beschämt.{/n} "Es ist meine Schuld. Ich habe die Schwäche nicht rechtzeitig erkannt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Haklısın {name}." {n}Heinrix'in sesi, utançla çınlıyor.{/n} "Bu benim hatam. Bu kadar zayıf olduğunu göremedim."
languages.original_text: "You are right, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with shame.{/n} "It is my fault. I did not see the weakness in time."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın {name}." {n}Heinrix'in sesi, utançla çınlıyor.{/n} Bu benim hatam. Zayıflığını zamanında göremedim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
